main event: A UFO sighting was reported in Gravel, Ohio, on June 27, 1962, initially detected by radar and later visually confirmed.
interesting points: The object was first detected at an altitude of 3,000-4,000 feet,Visual contact was made at 22:12, The object showed rapid diminishing and intermittent illumination, It was observed to accelerate and diminish in size before disappearing, The radar operator deemed the sighting credible despite it being casually dismissed as a meteor.
witness description: Radar operator who remained credible regarding the sighting.
